entry.title: WSL Bash customization using oh-my-posh
entry.summary:
In this post, I will explain how I tweaked my bash prompt in WSL using oh-my-posh. Below are the steps I followed to personalize my bash shell.
Install oh-my-posh.
sudo wget https://github.com/JanDeDobbeleer/oh-my-posh/releases/latest/download/posh-linux-amd64 -O /usr/local/bin/oh-my-posh sudo chmod +x /usr/local/bin/oh-my-posh
